commit message: Mention pandoc(1) in INSTALL.md build instructions

Sync serval-dna

Changes directory paths used on non-Android systems

Better logging of all mkdir(2) calls
Open CallDirector when no android phone dialler found, use MdpSocket for searching
Don't auto configure networks, instead indicate the presense of serval APs
Simplify and reword Share Us activity

Improve 0.92 release notes and Connect help

Change text 'Adhoc' to 'Ad Hoc' in UI
Start work on filtering logcat output to focus on recognised serval processes
Fix startup wizard layout
Commit current text from play store so we can improve our release process

Documentation license CC BY 4.0 International

Add copyright and license notices to all significant documentation

Render docs using GFM not standard Markdown

GFM = GitHub Flavoured Markdown

Add text of CC BY 4.0 license

In build.xml, add options to pandoc(1) conversion of Markdown to HTML
for help section, to properly format multi-level lists

Rename LICENSE.md to LICENSE-SOFTWARE.md

Add LICENSE-DOCUMENTATION.md (commons deed) and CC-BY.40.md (legal text)
Remove copyright/license notice from some help pages
Remove unused code

Keep serval daemon running after network goes down

Lots of work has been completed in serval-dna to reduce the CPU load of running the background daemon when there are no network peers or no network interfaces are enabled.
Replace MeshMS API with new HTTP interface, starting servald on demand
Sync configuration whenever the sdcard is (un)mounted
Update release notes and google play text
Use HTTP API for sending and reading MeshMS, ensure I/O is only done on background threads
Clarify the difference in Messaging between versions
Prevent crash if the system api returns a null string
Remove dead code
Clarify remaining Known Issues, document storage eviction feature
Offer to install updates based on compile time bundle id
Ensure rhizome store path is initialised on install
Prevent infinite loop trying to create sockets
Refresh file list when new bundles arrive
Return the content type of a file, don't delete temporary files immediately
Update release notes assuming we'll be done in July
Allow alpha builds of release candidates
Add project file for Android Studio
Show first 10 messages in a conversation quickly
Sync serval-dna
Don't intercept phone calls unless we have network peers
Show message timestamps when date changes or 30 minutes have elapsed
Document meshms timestamps and delivery notificiation
Sync serval-dna
